plaintiff.name: Maria Santos
plaintiff.address: 425 East 58th Street, Apt 12B, New York, NY 10022

accident.location: Third Avenue at East 42nd Street at East 42nd Street
accident.description: On Friday, March 15, 2024, at approximately 1435 hours, I, PO Rodriguez, responded to the scene of a motor vehicle accident at Third Avenue and East 42nd Street. Upon arrival, I observed two vehicles in the northbound lane of Third Avenue. Vehicle 1, a blue 2021 Honda Accord operated by Maria Santos, was stopped at a red traffic signal facing northbound. Vehicle 2, a white 2019 Ford F-150 operated by Robert Thompson and owned by Johnson Delivery Services LLC, was traveling northbound behind Vehicle 1. Vehicle 2 failed to stop and struck the rear of Vehicle 1. Driver Thompson stated he did not see Vehicle 1 stopped. Two independent witnesses stated they observed Vehicle 2 strike Vehicle 1 without braking, and one witness stated the driver appeared to be looking down. EMS Unit 45 responded and transported Driver Santos to Bellevue Hospital for treatment of neck and back pain. Driver Thompson was issued a summons for VTL 1129(a) - Following Too Closely.

injuries.injury_summary: Primary injuries: Cervical disc herniation C5-C6; Cervical sprain/strain

treatment_timeline.chief_complaint: Neck pain, lower back pain, headache following motor vehicle accident
Persistent neck and back pain, left arm numbness and tingling
treatments: C5-C6 transforaminal epidural steroid injection under fluoroscopic guidance

medical_providers.name: Manhattan Spine & Pain Medicine
medical_providers.address: 635 Madison Avenue, Suite 1400, New York, NY 10022

medical_providers.name: ActiveCare Physical Therapy
medical_providers.address: 220 East 42nd Street, Suite 500, New York, NY 10017

plaintiff_coverage.company: State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company

insurance_coverage.coverage_analysis: Defendant's BI limits ($250,000) exceed plaintiff's SUM. No SUM claim available.

witness_statements.name: David Chen
witness_statements.summary: Witness was standing on corner waiting to cross. Observed Vehicle 1 (blue Honda) stopped at red light. Vehicle 2 (white pickup) came up behind and struck Vehicle 1 without braking. Stated driver of Vehicle 2 appeared to be looking down, possibly at phone.

witness_statements.name: Jennifer Walsh
witness_statements.summary: Witness was in vehicle behind Vehicle 2. Observed Vehicle 2 strike Vehicle 1 without stopping. Did not see Vehicle 2 brake lights illuminate before impact.

liability_analysis.liability_assessment: Strong liability case. Defendant cited for: Following Too Closely. 2 independent witness(es) support plaintiff's version.

supporting_evidence: MRI-confirmed C5-C6 disc herniation with radiculopathy
56-67% loss of cervical ROM persisting beyond 30 days
Unable to work since accident (now 30+ days)
Decreased ROM in all planes of cervical spine (44-56% loss)
Work restrictions preventing return to employment
Disability duration initially 2 weeks with likely extension

recommended_actions: Send policy limits demand to defendant's carrier ($250,000 available)
Request updated records from all treating providers
Obtain final bills with No-Fault payments and balances due
